title: This children's event has become a target of extremist groups
description: Drag queen story hours, designed to promote inclusion and get kids excited about reading, have become a target for right-wing extremist groups, including the Proud Boys.

title: Some Tesla drivers use kids as a prop to test 'full self-driving' feature
description: A software CEO is asking Tesla to ban their 'self-driving' feature until they can prove the software will detect children. In defense of the company, some Tesla enthusiasts used their children as props to show that the feature really works. CNN's Jake Tapper reports.

title: ICE officials under Trump told to wipe phones when leaving agency
description: The phones of several top Trump-era Immigration and Customs Enforcement officials were deactivated when they left their positions and the data contained on them likely wiped, a court filing released late last week shows.

title: Watch weather reporter rescue woman from flood waters on air
description: FOX reporter Robert Ray rescued a woman from her submerged vehicle after Dallas' major flash flood. The act was captured by another camera crew and was broadcasted on air.

title: See Jupiter through the eyes of the world's most powerful telescope
description: Rainbow auroras, giant storms and far-off galaxies are all on display in the latest images of Jupiter from NASA's James Webb Space Telescope.

title: Russia blaming Ukraine for killing of daughter of Putin ally
description: CNN's Fred Pleitgen reports that Russia is blaming Ukraine for the car bomb that killed Darya Dugina, the daughter of influential Russian philosopher Alexander Dugin. ​Ukraine denies it was involved.

title: Women are posting their own dancing videos in support of Finnish PM Sanna Marin
description: Women across the world are posting videos on social media of themselves dancing, after criticism was leveled at Finnish Prime Minister Sanna Marin for leaked footage that showed her partying with friends.

title: Harry Styles talks privacy and sexuality in a new interview
description: Even the biggest pop star in the world is uncomfortable when his private relationships go public.

title: Quiet quitting is the latest workplace trend, but it doesn't mean what you think
description: Years of long hours, understaffed companies and burned-out employees have all led to the latest TikTok trend: quiet quitting.

title: Elon Musk subpoenas former Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey as legal battle heats up
description: Elon Musk has subpoenaed former Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey as part of his effort to fight a lawsuit from the company attempting to force the billionaire to move forward with their $44 billion acquisition deal.

title: Analysis: Dugina killing is a flashback to 1990s Russia
description: The death of Darya Dugina, the daughter of Russian ultranationalist firebrand Alexander Dugin, is at first glance a flashback to 1990s Russia, when gangsters settled scores with contract killings and car bombs.

title: William and Kate to move family out of London to give children 'normal' life
description: The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge are set to move their family out of London during school term time, in a bid to give their children a "normal" family life, a royal source told CNN.

title: See moment boat explodes while sitting in marina
description: An explosion on a boat at Halifax Harbor Marina injured four people, according to the Daytona Beach Fire Department. CNN affiliate WKMG has more.

title: US politics explained: Why the 2022 midterm elections matter
description: What happens in the 2022 midterm elections will shape the rest of President Biden's first term. CNN's Eva McKend explains.

title: Rory McIlroy throws fan's remote-controlled ball into water at BMW Championship
description: From human streakers to deer and alligators, course intruders have taken many forms in golf's long history, but Saturday saw a 21st century twist on the trespassing trend -- a remote-controlled ball.

title: Chinese censors change ending of latest 'Minions' movie
description: Censors have altered the ending of the recent animated film "Minions: The Rise of Gru" for its domestic release in China, social media users across the country noticed over the weekend.

title: Fauci to depart US government in December after 38 years
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci on Monday announced that he will be leaving government work at the end of the year.

title: See ancient Buddhist statues revealed by receding water levels in China
description: Chinese state media, Xinhua, has reported that low water levels in the Yangtze River have revealed a trio of Buddhist statues that are believed to be 600 years old, according to Reuters.

title: See why this group is 'painstakingly' scouring Ukraine's land
description: CNN's David McKenzie joins a disposal team who slowly and carefully crawls every inch of ground to locate and remove live ammunition and ordinance littered throughout Ukraine.

title: Priyanka Chopra Jonas shares picture with her daughter
description: Priyanka Chopra Jonas clearly enjoys being a mom.

title: Rare prehistoric site from 5,000 B.C. emerges amidst drought
description: Amid Spain's worst drought in decades, a rare prehistoric site has emerged. Dubbed "Spanish Stonehenge," a rock formation believed to date back to 5,000 B.C. is now fully emerged after waters in the surrounding reservoir receded. CNN's Isa Soares reports.

title: Sarah Hyland, 'Modern Family' star, marries Wells Adams
description: It was a "Modern Family" reunion when Sarah Hyland tied the knot with her longtime partner, Wells Adams, over the weekend.

title: A grim winter will test Europe's support for Ukraine like never before
description: Six months since Russia invaded Ukraine, the West's response to the crisis has remained strong and largely united -- to the surprise of many.

title: Raila Odinga challenges presidential results in Kenyan Supreme Court
description: Presidential candidate Raila Odinga has formally filed a petition challenging the election results in Kenya's Supreme Court on Monday, according to one of Odinga's lawyers, Daniel Maanzo.

title: Woman believed to be mother of children found dead in suitcases is in South Korea, say Seoul police
description: A woman believed to be the mother of two children whose remains were found in suitcases in New Zealand last week is in South Korea, a Seoul police official told CNN on Monday.

title: China's Belt and Road is facing challenges. But can the US counter it?
Ukraine denies involvement in Moscow car bombing
Video shows aftermath of scene where Dugina was killed
description: Russian authorities say they have opened a murder investigation after the daughter of influential, ultra-nationalist philosopher Alexander Dugin was killed by a car bomb on the outskirts of Moscow. CNN's Fred Pleitgen has more.

title: Pakistan's former PM Imran Khan investigated by police under anti-terror law
description: Pakistani authorities are investigating whether former prime minister Imran Khan violated anti-terror laws and have banned him from speaking live on television, in moves likely to inflame tensions between Khan, who maintains mass popular support, and the coalition government.

title: Car bomb kills daughter of 'spiritual guide' to Putin's Ukraine war
2 Arkansas deputies suspended, 1 officer on leave after video posted of violent encounter with man
description: Three Arkansas law enforcement officers have been removed from duty and are under investigation, their departments confirmed, after bystander video captured them appearing to punch and knee a suspect during an arrest Sunday.

title: China flexes military muscles, then targets Taiwan's citrus fruits
description: For the last 18 years, Li Meng-han and his family have grown pomelos in a rural town near the southern Taiwanese city of Tainan.

title: Expert: Beijing's ban on Taiwan's citrus fruits 'politically motivated'
description: As US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi made a high-profile trip to Taiwan, Beijing initiated a series of military and economic measures to punish Taiwan. Among the measures were a sudden ban on Taiwan's citrus fruits and two types of fish products. CNN's Blake Essig reports.

title: Pence's 2024 hopes loom over potential testimony to Jan. 6 committee
description: Key members of the House committee probing the January 6, 2021, insurrection are dialing up pressure on former Vice President Mike Pence -- whom pro-Donald Trump rioters demanded be hanged on that dark day -- to testify to their committee.

title: At least 20 people killed, dozens injured after gunmen storm Mogadishu hotel
description: At least 15 people have been killed after unidentified gunmen stormed an upscale hotel in the Somali capital, Mogadishu, on Friday evening, officials said, following gunfire and large explosions in the area.

title: McConnell just made the 2022 election about Trump's political future
description: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell's brutal assessment last week was that Republicans may not win back the Senate in 2022 because of a lack of "candidate quality."

title: Yangtze River waters reveal Buddhist statues
description: Plunging water levels of the Yangtze River have revealed a submerged island in China's southwestern city of Chongqing and a trio of Buddhist statues on it that are believed to be 600 years old, state media Xinhua has reported.

title: Japan considers deploying long-range missiles to counter China, newspaper reports
description: Japan is considering the deployment of 1,000 long-range cruise missiles to boost its counterattack capability against China, the Yomiuri newspaper reported on Sunday.

title: China's July Russian coal imports hit 5-year high as West shuns Moscow
description: China's coal imports from Russia jumped 14% in July from a year earlier to their highest in at least five years, as China bought discounted coal while Western countries shunned Russian cargoes over its invasion of Ukraine.

title: Flash flooding at a national park in New Mexico forced the evacuation of about 160
description: About 160 people had to shelter in place for hours at Carlsbad Caverns National Park in New Mexico due to flash flooding before they were evacuated Saturday, authorities said.

title: Acosta presses ex-acting Trump DHS official about family separation policy. Hear his response
description: CNN's Jim Acosta presses Chad Wolf, former acting Department of Homeland Security secretary during the Trump administration, on the administration's zero-tolerance family separation policy.

title: The sad and surprising story of North Korea's floating hotel
description: It was once an exclusive five-star resort floating directly over Australia's Great Barrier Reef. For years, it sat dilapidated in a North Korean port, a 20-minute drive from the Demilitarized Zone, the restricted area that separates the two Koreas.

title: Video captures gun battle between Somali forces and terrorists at hotel
description: Somali forces have ended the siege at an upscale hotel in the country's capital Mogadishu, police told CNN, following an attack from Al-Qaeda linked terrorist group Al-Shabaab. CNN's Larry Madowo reports.

title: Audi debuts Grandsphere, an electric, self-driving concept car with lounge-like interior
description: German automaker Audi showed off its Grandsphere concept car, which features a retractable steering wheel and lounge-like seating.
